## findProjectName() function

Locates the workspace project, either from the configured project name, else falls back to the default project

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function findProjectName(workspaceOrHost: WorkspaceSchema | Tree, options: {
    project?: string;
}): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspaceOrHost | <code>WorkspaceSchema &#124; Tree</code> | the workspace root |
|  options | <code>{</code><br/><code>    project?: string;</code><br/><code>}</code> | the options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

the project
